item.title: Burn The Future I
item.description: Certainly, I can help you correct the grammatical errors in your text: It’s pretty late, and I’m typing on my old tactile switch keyboard while thinking (well, I’ve been thinking) about my future. I feel like my perspective on my ideal future has changed a lot since I started school (which is crazy, considering it has only been a bit more than two years). What I first pictured for myself was the life of a successful entrepreneur with lots of control, money, and influence.
